title: Strictly Come Dancing: Tess Daly wows in a black gown as she joins a stylish Claudia Winkleman
text:
They always know how to dress to impress while co-hosting Strictly Come Dancing.

And Tess Daly channeled her inner witch as she joined a stylish Claudka Winkleman to co-host the show's live Halloween special on Saturday night.

The presenter, 50, looked sensational in a black thigh-split gown that showed off her slender frame, while the TV personality, 47, put on a chic display in a tulle gown.

Strictly Come Dancing: Tess Daly channelled her inner witch in a black thigh-split gown as she joined a stylish Claudia Winkleman to co-host show's Halloween special on Saturday

Tess pulled her blonde locks back into a stylish up-do, while she wore a natural palette of make-up to highlight her pretty features.

Adding to her outfit's spooky theme, Tess's outfit had flared sleeves and a floating skirt that showed off her bronzed legs.

Offsetting the gothic ensemble, Tess completed her look by wearing a pair of dazzling hoop earrings and silver ankle-strap heels.

Elegant: Claudia's sleeveless outfit had a beige and black striped ombre style, with her outfit cinched at the waist before cascading into a puffy tulle skirt

Meanwhile, Claudia's sleeveless outfit had a beige and black striped ombre style, with her outfit cinched at the waist before cascading into a puffy tulle skirt.

Her raven tresses were styled sleek and straight while her pretty features were enhanced with her signature smoky eye and a scarlet lipstick.

Keeping the look simple, Claudia complemented her outfit by wearing beige suede heels, while she wore a gold watch and necklace.

Witch way to go? Joking around about the show's Halloween spooktacular, Tess took to Instagram to share a fun snap where she pretended to be a witch

Strictly Halloween Week: The Leaderboard Alex Scott and Kevin Clifton - Couples’ Choice (Street/Commercial) - Ghostbusters by Ray Parker Jr - 34 points out of 40 Catherine Tyldesley and Johannes Radebe - Cha Cha - Scared Of The Dark by Steps - 24 points out of 40 Emma Barton and Anton Du Beke - Tango - Toccata and Fugue in D Minor by Bach - 28 points out of 40 Emma Weymouth and Aljaz Skorjanec - Charleston - A Little Party Never Killed Nobody by Fergie feat. Q-Tip and GoonRock - 30 points out of 40 Michelle Visage and Giovanni Pernice - Foxtrot - Addams Family by Vic Mizzy - 39 points out of 40 Saffron Barker and AJ Pritchard - Jive - Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic by The Police - 33 points out of 40 Chris Ramsey and Karen Hauer -Samba - Everybody (Backstreet’s Back) by Backstreet Boys - 23 points out of 40 Karim Zeroual and Amy Dowden - Paso Doble - Smalltown Boy by Bronski Beat - 29 points out of 40 Kelvin Fletcher and Oti Mabuse - Tango - Bad Guy by Billie Eilish - 36 points out of 40 Mike Bushell and Katya Jones - Tango - What You Waiting For by Gwen Stefani - 26 points out of 40

Having fun? Claudia also flaunted her gothic-style black and taupe gown as she took to Instagram to show off her look

Cosy: The two presenting pals shared a glimpse of their looks as they prepared to present the dancing show

Joking around about the show's Halloween spooktacular, Tess took to Instagram to share a fun snap where she pretended to be a witch.

Standing astride a broom and smiling brightly for the camera, Tess joked that the unconventional item was part of her 'Daly commute.'

10 celebrities took to the stage in fun costumes to embody the show's Halloween special, with Michelle Visage and Giovanni Pernice topping the leaderboard.
description: The presenter, 50, looked sensational as she joined her stylish co-host, 47, for the show's live Halloween special on Saturday night.
